sentences.en: A large sideboard with drawers and cupboards.
Castle went to the sideboard and poured himself a whisky.
sentences.cn: 卡斯尔走到餐柜前面,给自己斟了杯威士忌.

sentences.en: He went to the sideboard and poured himself a whisky.
sentences.cn: 他走到餐具柜边,给自己倒了一杯威士忌酒.

sentences.en: I got a bottle of my best malt out of the sideboard.
sentences.cn: 我从餐具柜里取出一瓶自己收藏的最好的麦芽威士忌。

sentences.en: I lined the bottles up on the sideboard.
sentences.cn: 我把酒放在餐具柜上排好.

sentences.en: I saw two tooth - brushes on the sideboard.
sentences.cn: 我看见了餐具柜上有两把牙刷.

sentences.en: I'd like my sideboard cut short , please.
Instead, I fainted and hit my head on the sideboard, my last thought before passing out being that maybe if I hit myself hard enough I would get a couple of days in bed. A while off school.
sentences.cn: 我想要对他们都表示感谢，但我却昏倒了，头撞在了食具柜上，在我即将昏迷的那一瞬，我最后的念头是，如果撞得足够厉害，或许可以卧床休息一两天，那样可以有几天不用去学校，并能使别人对我稍加观注。

sentences.en: She put some plates in the sideboard.
sentences.cn: 她往餐具柜里放了些盘子.

sentences.en: She wouldn't understand the hint, but followed me to a sideboard, where I went to lay my bonnet, and importuned me in a whisper to give her directly what I had brought.
sentences.cn: 她不懂这个暗示，却跟着我到一个餐具柜那儿，我是到那儿放下我的帽子的，她低声央求我把我所带来的东西马上给她。

sentences.en: Sideboard connecting screws are made on two ends of the baffle.
sentences.cn: 挡板两端制有边板连接螺丝.

sentences.en: The new furniture made an excellent showing , the sideboard which Hurstwood himself arranged gleamed brightly.
sentences.cn: 新家具显得非常豪华, 赫斯渥亲手布置的餐具柜闪闪发亮.

sentences.en: The sideboard of the truck has been knocked out of shape.
sentences.cn: 卡车的车帮被撞得变了形.

sentences.en: There are a pair of vases on the sideboard.
sentences.cn: 在餐具架上有一对花瓶.

sentences.en: We keep the silver in this sideboard.
sentences.cn: 我们把金属餐具放在这个餐具柜里.

sentences.en: Who often dusts the sideboard in the morning?
sentences.cn: 谁常常早上擦抹餐具柜?

trans.tran_en: a long low piece of furniture usually in a  dining room  , used for storing plates, glasses etc
